name: playwright-smart-reporter
description: An intelligent Playwright HTML reporter with AI-powered failure analysis, flakiness detection, and performance regression alerts

scripts.test:merge-local: rm -rf blob-reports && mkdir -p blob-reports/all && PLAYWRIGHT_BLOB_OUTPUT_DIR=blob-reports/run1 playwright test example/parallel/test1.spec.ts --config=example/playwright-blob.config.ts; PLAYWRIGHT_BLOB_OUTPUT_DIR=blob-reports/run2 playwright test example/parallel/test2.spec.ts --config=example/playwright-blob.config.ts; cp blob-reports/run1/*.zip blob-reports/run2/*.zip blob-reports/all/; node ./dist/merge-history.js blob-reports/run1/test-history.json blob-reports/run2/test-history.json -o blob-reports/all/test-history.json; npx playwright merge-reports --reporter=./dist/smart-reporter.js blob-reports/all

author: Gary Parker
